subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The past week began with a 23-point loss in Toronto and ended with a 26-point loss in Orlando, losses that pushed the Knicks to a season-worst 23 games under .500.
snippet: The past week began with a 23-point loss in Toronto and ended with a 26-point loss in Orlando, losses that pushed the Knicks to a season-worst 23 games under .500.
